Description:
Prepare & present technical proposals & POC (proof of concept) to the customers.
Provide consultation to business partners & customers on best utilization for vendors' products.
Implement and install (IBM-HCL) security applications and software.
Train the Business partners to obtain needed certificates.
Follow up with all stakeholders on running projects progress.
Manage security operations infrastructure (Firewalls, IDPS, SIEM, etc.)
Present service level reporting, risk and contingency plan.
Responsible for company security environment.
Supervise the security team.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor of Engineering/Computer Science.
2-3 years of experience in similar role.
CCNA certificate is required.
Knowledge of IBM security products is a must (Qradar, Guardium, Soar...).
Ability to work with minimum supervision.
Time Management and Problem Solving.
Excellent Communication & Presentation skills.
Fluent English (verbal and written).
